attributes.action: Make it compulsory to install solar panels to every new building in Britain.
attributes.additional_details: The average cost of solar panels and installation is between £6,000 and £9,000. (Referenced from Uswitch). This cost could be added onto the house price when sold which wouldn't make such a difference when spending a large some of money. This would help Britain to reduce it's green house gases and become a cleaner country.
attributes.background: If every new building had solar panels installed it would cut the carbon footprint for each new build in the long term. The tenants living in the house would see a decreased energy bill yearly. The added costs for installing the solar panels could be added onto the house price when sold.
